UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of Pro --> peptoid residue substitution on cell selectivity and mechanism of antibacterial action of tritrpticin-amide antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Zhu WL, Lan H, Park Y, Yang ST, Kim JI, Park IS, You HJ, Lee JS, Park YS, Kim Y, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=52 µM,Human erythrocytes:32% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:48% Hemolysis=10 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=18µM)
